sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表达“我有这样子的感觉，没问题吧？”

sentences.english: No thanks, I would rather go somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 那就算了，我再去别的地方看看吧。

sentences.english: I hope to be available for the Coppa Italia match against Udinese. I remain confident.
sentences.chinese: 希望在意大利杯对阵乌迪内斯的比赛时我能复出吧。

sentences.english: B. That's fine. May be I should have boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，也许我吃水煮蛋算了。
那么让他们放马过来吧。

sentences.english: For now, let others help you be successful.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前，让别人帮助你成功吧。
因此，混搭你自己的百搭果仁吧。

sentences.english: See my your ratify wanting to know current three major pcses were what?
sentences.chinese: 看到这里你肯定想知道现在的三大件是什么了吧？

sentences.english: Give them a call and hang out sometime.
sentences.chinese: 给他们打个电话，约个时间出去逛逛吧。

sentences.english: Let’s say you want to make an extra $200 a month.
sentences.chinese: 再打个比方吧，你想每月多挣个200美刀。

sentences.english: Even if not to stay, so grand luxury Memorial also to be a trip.
sentences.chinese: 即使留不住，如此隆重奢华的祭奠也算不虚此行吧。

sentences.english: Perhaps, this is the unbending youth from northeast of China.
sentences.chinese: 也许这就是一个北方大男孩的那种倔强吧？

definition: interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!

sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of

oh (interjection indicating doubt or surprise)

sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples

woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
(phonetic)
to cough up/also pr. [ka3]
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
